#summary my-own-repo-web-interface howto

= Installation =

Place php-files into web server dir, pm-files into /usr/lib/my-own-repo-web-interface/, my-own-repo-update.pl file into /usr/bin/my-own-repo-update.

= Configuration =
All you need is edit config.php to change path to sqlite db file.

= Usage =

Init db with:

my-own-repo-update --init pacman /path/to/repo-sqlite.db /path/to/packages/dir

Place following command into cron:

my-own-repo-update pacman /path/to/repo-sqlite.db /path/to/packages/dir

That is all. Now you can browse http://your-server.tld/path/to/search.php
